item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: kubasto
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: kubasto
item.content:encoded:
[list icon="sign-in"]
  • Bright & dark schemes + easy unlimited color variations
  • Unlimited sliders (3 types)
  • 7 post formats
  • Social media integration
  • 8 custom widgets
  • Traslation to 4 languages
  • Filterable portfolio (4 size types)
  • Galleries (4 sizes) + Fancybox
  • Hundreds of fonts
  • 12 shortcodes
  • Smart images loading
  • 110 social media icons + 100 special icons
[/list]

item.title: Sliders and banners
item.dc:creator: kubasto
item.content:encoded:
There are 3 slider layouts (and you can use any of them on any page): [column width="1/3" first="yes"]

1. Full width slider

Watch example [/column] [column width="1/3"]

2. Slider + two banners

Watch example [/column] [column width="1/3" last="yes"]

3. Slider + text

Watch example [/column] [line]

Features of the banner system

[column width="1/3" first="yes"] [list icon="finished-work"]
  • fully responsive
  • unlimited sliders
  • individual sliders for each page
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3"] [list icon="finished-work"]
  • auto play or auto pause at start
  • touch gestures on mobile devices
  • optional caption on banners
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" last="yes"] [list icon="finished-work"]
  • content may be tweaked for mobile devices
  • optional text for each slide (HTML supported)
  • individual links
[/list] [/column]

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: kubasto
item.content:encoded: This is a premium WordPress theme, which you can buy on ThemeForest. I've used work of the following authors for this demo site: [gallery link="file" order="DESC" columns="6"] PC.DE Bremen icon pack WPZOOM Social Networking Icon Set Thank you.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: kubasto
item.content:encoded:
If you are not familiar with shortcodes, these are extra magic spells to use in text which can for example add a special highlight or text box. You just start with opening shortcode, put some text or other stuff inside and write closing shotrcode on the end. Some shortcodes don't need the closing tag (for example horizontal lines). Have a look at some examples of Website shortcodes: [line]

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: two nights ago I had a meth head follow me home. He told me he goes both ways and I look really cute. That's when I should have hit him with my skateboard. Instead I walked into the 7-11. He followed me and stood looking over my shoulder as I purchased my night-cap beer. I left and rode my skateboard fast all the way home. Damn tweekers. "Im high on crystal" he says with 4 missing teeth.
